item.title: Writeup ITNSA 2021 - Packet Tracer Troubleshooting
item.description: Table Of Contents Introduction Troubleshooting 1 (Point: 25) Questions Answers Troubleshooting 2 (Point: 25) Questions Answers Troubleshooting 3 (Point: 25) Questions Answers Troubleshooting 4 (Point: 25) Questions Answers Summary Introduction Hi, we meet again, this time we will try questions from the ITNSA section of Cisco Packet Tracer Troubleshooting, unlike the last question, we only try troubleshooting on the network that is already available. Let’s try, like usual, this question is done using Cisco Packet Tracer For those interested in trying it can be downloaded from this link ITNSA

item.title: Writeup ITNSA 2021 - Network Actual & Future Network
item.description: Table Of Contents Introduction Task 1 Configure HQ MATARAM Server Completed Points: 8% Task 2 Configure HQ MATARAM Router Completed Points: 19% Task 3 Configure Switch SW_HQ_L1 HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 5% Task 4 Configure Switch SW_HQ_L2 HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 3% Task 5 Verify PC settings Admin2 HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 6 Wireless Controller (WLC) Configure HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 8% Task 7 LeighWeight Access Point (LWAP) Configure HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 8 End Device Configuration and Verification on VLAN HRD and VLAN MARKETING HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 9 Configure BRANCH SUMBAWA Server Completed Points: 10% Task 10 Configure BRANCH SUMBAWA Router Completed Points: 11% Task 11 Configure Switch SW_BRANCH BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 3% Task 12 End Device Configuration and Verification on PC VLAN 2 SALES BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 0% Task 13 Configure Wireless Router WRT_BRANCH BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 4% Task 14 End Device Configuration and Verification on WLAN ENGINEER BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 2% Task 15 Configure VPN using GRE over IPSec and OSPF on router HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 8% Task 16 Configure VPN using GRE over IPSec and OSPF on router BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 8% Task 17 Verify VPN Connection from End Device HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 18 Verify VPN Connection from End Device SUMBAWA BRANCH Completed Points: 0% Task 19 Role Based Access Control (RBAC) configuration on router HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 1% Task 20 Role Based Access Control (RBAC) configuration on router BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 1% Complete Configuration Router HQ MATARAM Router BRANCH SUMBAWA Summary Introduction Because I was bored on the Internet, I tried questions from the ITNSA competition which was held in 2021.
